nagaraye sinama hal natya,samithi,deshapalanaya ma wisin premaya wenuwata aadesha lesa thoraganna ladi..dewana wara usas pela awasana ma usas adhyapanayata yomu wuwath kirimata wisesa wada nomathi wishala kalayak ma hata ithiriwiya..ma demapiyan samanga ma wisu heyin da pera nagaraya maru nowana heyinda mata wishesha jiwana barak ho loka wenasak nopenuni..ee kala ma wisin nandasena rathanapala saha noyek mano widya sahitha poth kiyawimata nambauru wuna kalayaki..ketharam apa wasan karanu thanuwath mata baswala yana ena pemwathun dakinawita mathak wuye eda ma da ese weli giya awasthaya..kalaya wisin ma darshanikayaku karanu athayi ma sithuwemi..eheth eya mayawak bawa pasuwa watahena ladi.
